desc.en: At the Black Market, the Foreclosure Task Force see their debt money being funneled into the Stygian Bank. Outraged that their hard-earned money is being used for illicit activities, the students plan a bank heist.
desc.jp: At the Black Market, the Foreclosure Task Force see their debt money being funneled into the Stygian Bank. Outraged that their hard-earned money is being used for illicit activities, the students plan a bank heist.
desc.thai: At the Black Market, the Foreclosure Task Force see their debt money being funneled into the Stygian Bank. Outraged that their hard-earned money is being used for illicit activities, the students plan a bank heist.
desc.ko: At the Black Market, the Foreclosure Task Force see their debt money being funneled into the Stygian Bank. Outraged that their hard-earned money is being used for illicit activities, the students plan a bank heist.
desc.zh_tw: 巡视黑市的對策委員會一行人看到，自己所偿还的债款流入暗黑银行。当学生们得知自己努力还的钱被用来做违法勾当，便在一怒之下决定抢银行。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 巡视黑市的对策委员会一行人看到，自己所偿还的债款流入暗黑银行。当学生们得知自己努力还的钱被用来做违法勾当，便在一怒之下决定抢银行。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 巡视黑市的对策委员会一行人看到，自己所偿还的债款流入暗黑银行。当学生们得知自己努力还的钱被用来做违法勾当，便在一怒之下决定抢银行。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 巡视黑市的对策委员会一行人看到，自己所偿还的债款流入暗黑银行。当学生们得知自己努力还的钱被用来做违法勾当，便在一怒之下决定抢银行。

desc.en: Walking for hours long, the Foreclosure Task Force and Hifumi are all exhausted. Wanting to eat some Taiyaki, Nonomi offers everyone some as well.
desc.jp: Walking for hours long, the Foreclosure Task Force and Hifumi are all exhausted. Wanting to eat some Taiyaki, Nonomi offers everyone some as well.
desc.thai: Walking for hours long, the Foreclosure Task Force and Hifumi are all exhausted. Wanting to eat some Taiyaki, Nonomi offers everyone some as well.
desc.ko: Walking for hours long, the Foreclosure Task Force and Hifumi are all exhausted. Wanting to eat some Taiyaki, Nonomi offers everyone some as well.
desc.zh_tw: 走了几小时的對策委員會与日步美筋疲力尽，野乃美因为想吃鲷鱼烧，于是顺带请了所有人一份。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 走了几小时的对策委员会与日富美筋疲力尽，野宫因为想吃鲷鱼烧，于是顺带请了所有人一份。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 走了几小时的对策委员会与日步美筋疲力尽，野乃美因为想吃鲷鱼烧，于是顺带请了所有人一份。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 走了几小时的对策委员会与日富美筋疲力尽，野宫因为想吃鲷鱼烧，于是顺带请了所有人一份。

desc.en: Hifumi continues to introduce the situation at the Black Market and mentions about the Black Market Bank. As discussion goes, Ayane warns that the securities are approaching and everyone hides immediately.

desc.zh_tw: 日步美继续向众人介绍黑市的情况，并提到了其中的黑银行。就在所有人还在讨论时，綾音突然警告黑市安保人员靠近，所有人立即藏了起来。

desc.en: Everyone discovers that their debt payment seems to be funneling directly into the bank. And in order to prove this, Shiroko brings up her plan of robbing a bank again, hoping to find the documents in the process. Hifumi is then "willingly" to be involved in this.
desc.jp: Everyone discovers that their debt payment seems to be funneling directly into the bank. And in order to prove this, Shiroko brings up her plan of robbing a bank again, hoping to find the documents in the process. Hifumi is then "willingly" to be involved in this.
desc.thai: Everyone discovers that their debt payment seems to be funneling directly into the bank. And in order to prove this, Shiroko brings up her plan of robbing a bank again, hoping to find the documents in the process. Hifumi is then "willingly" to be involved in this.
desc.ko: Everyone discovers that their debt payment seems to be funneling directly into the bank. And in order to prove this, Shiroko brings up her plan of robbing a bank again, hoping to find the documents in the process. Hifumi is then "willingly" to be involved in this.
desc.zh_tw: 众人发现自己的钱财似乎流入了黑市银行，而为了证实这一点，白子再次提起了自己抢银行的计划，希望藉由找到证明文件。众人顺便把日步美卷入其中。

desc.en: In her letter, Hoshino reveals that she joined Kaiser PMC in exchange for Abydos High School's debt being forgiven. Now, without Hoshino, the remaining members of the Foreclosure Task Force scramble when PMC forces close in on Abydos High School.
desc.jp: In her letter, Hoshino reveals that she joined Kaiser PMC in exchange for Abydos High School's debt being forgiven. Now, without Hoshino, the remaining members of the Foreclosure Task Force scramble when PMC forces close in on Abydos High School.
desc.thai: In her letter, Hoshino reveals that she joined Kaiser PMC in exchange for Abydos High School's debt being forgiven. Now, without Hoshino, the remaining members of the Foreclosure Task Force scramble when PMC forces close in on Abydos High School.
desc.ko: In her letter, Hoshino reveals that she joined Kaiser PMC in exchange for Abydos High School's debt being forgiven. Now, without Hoshino, the remaining members of the Foreclosure Task Force scramble when PMC forces close in on Abydos High School.
desc.zh_tw: 星野在信上写说，为了免除阿拜多斯高中的债务，自己已经去当凯萨PMC的佣兵。在其余對策委員會一行人深感混乱之际，PMC兵力为了占领星野消失踪影的阿拜多斯高中而来犯。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 星野在信上写说，为了免除阿拜多斯高中的债务，自己已经去当凯萨PMC的佣兵。在其余对策委员会一行人深感混乱之际，PMC兵力为了占领星野消失踪影的阿拜多斯高中而来犯。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 星野在信上写说，为了免除阿拜多斯高中的债务，自己已经去当凯萨PMC的佣兵。在其余对策委员会一行人深感混乱之际，PMC兵力为了占领星野消失踪影的阿拜多斯高中而来犯。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 星野在信上写说，为了免除阿拜多斯高中的债务，自己已经去当凯萨PMC的佣兵。在其余对策委员会一行人深感混乱之际，PMC兵力为了占领星野消失踪影的阿拜多斯高中而来犯。

desc.en: Hoshino left an resignation application and a letter. In the letter, Hoshino confesses the fact that she is going to be a mercenary at PMC, and says that "(the Black Suit) will take on half of Abydos' debt".
desc.jp: Hoshino left an resignation application and a letter. In the letter, Hoshino confesses the fact that she is going to be a mercenary at PMC, and says that "(the Black Suit) will take on half of Abydos' debt".
desc.thai: Hoshino left an resignation application and a letter. In the letter, Hoshino confesses the fact that she is going to be a mercenary at PMC, and says that "(the Black Suit) will take on half of Abydos' debt".
desc.ko: Hoshino left an resignation application and a letter. In the letter, Hoshino confesses the fact that she is going to be a mercenary at PMC, and says that "(the Black Suit) will take on half of Abydos' debt".
desc.zh_tw: 星野留下了退社书和一封信。在信中，星野向所有人坦白了去PMC做佣兵的事情，并说出了“（黑服）将会承担一半阿拜多斯债务”的事情。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 星野留下了退社书和一封信。在信中，星野向所有人坦白了去PMC做佣兵的事情，并说出了“（黑服）将会承担一半阿拜多斯债务”的事情。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 星野留下了退社书和一封信。在信中，星野向所有人坦白了去PMC做佣兵的事情，并说出了“（黑服）将会承担一半阿拜多斯债务”的事情。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 星野留下了退社书和一封信。在信中，星野向所有人坦白了去PMC做佣兵的事情，并说出了“（黑服）将会承担一半阿拜多斯债务”的事情。

desc.en: Hoshino signs at PMC office. Black Suit says that in this way, Hoshino will be transferring all her rights to him (in other words, Hoshino just sold herself), and promises the debt will be taken care as promised.
desc.jp: Hoshino signs at PMC office. Black Suit says that in this way, Hoshino will be transferring all her rights to him (in other words, Hoshino just sold herself), and promises the debt will be taken care as promised.
desc.thai: Hoshino signs at PMC office. Black Suit says that in this way, Hoshino will be transferring all her rights to him (in other words, Hoshino just sold herself), and promises the debt will be taken care as promised.
desc.ko: Hoshino signs at PMC office. Black Suit says that in this way, Hoshino will be transferring all her rights to him (in other words, Hoshino just sold herself), and promises the debt will be taken care as promised.
desc.zh_tw: 星野在PMC办公室签了名。黑服表示，这样的话，星野就将自己所有的权利转移给了他（相当于卖了自己），并承诺债款将会如约承担。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 星野在PMC办公室签了名。黑服表示，这样的话，星野就将自己所有的权利转移给了他（相当于卖了自己），并承诺债款将会如约承担。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 星野在PMC办公室签了名。黑服表示，这样的话，星野就将自己所有的权利转移给了他（相当于卖了自己），并承诺债款将会如约承担。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 星野在PMC办公室签了名。黑服表示，这样的话，星野就将自己所有的权利转移给了他（相当于卖了自己），并承诺债款将会如约承担。

hobby.jp: 昼寝、ゴロゴロすること

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.thai: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.ko: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.zh_tw: 黑色西服人是蔚藍檔案中的反派角色，隸屬於組織“數祕會”。其主要目標是研究基沃託斯中的神祕，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多個故事中均有出現。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: Hoshino says that this is an responsibility that she should take, and hopes that in this way the Foreclosure Task Force would be less stressed. The letter ends here.
desc.jp: Hoshino says that this is an responsibility that she should take, and hopes that in this way the Foreclosure Task Force would be less stressed. The letter ends here.
desc.thai: Hoshino says that this is an responsibility that she should take, and hopes that in this way the Foreclosure Task Force would be less stressed. The letter ends here.
desc.ko: Hoshino says that this is an responsibility that she should take, and hopes that in this way the Foreclosure Task Force would be less stressed. The letter ends here.
desc.zh_tw: 星野表示这是自己应该背负的责任，希望能够减轻對策委員會的压力。信在此终止。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 星野表示这是自己应该背负的责任，希望能够减轻对策委员会的压力。信在此终止。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 星野表示这是自己应该背负的责任，希望能够减轻对策委员会的压力。信在此终止。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 星野表示这是自己应该背负的责任，希望能够减轻对策委员会的压力。信在此终止。

desc.en: In another letter, Hoshino confesses that she does, neither like, nor believe adults. When Shiroko carried Sensei and arrived there, she was even disgusted; but eventually she trusted Sensei. She entrusted Shiroko to Sensei, hoping that Sensei could teach her well and don't let her make mistakes.
desc.jp: In another letter, Hoshino confesses that she does, neither like, nor believe adults. When Shiroko carried Sensei and arrived there, she was even disgusted; but eventually she trusted Sensei. She entrusted Shiroko to Sensei, hoping that Sensei could teach her well and don't let her make mistakes.
desc.thai: In another letter, Hoshino confesses that she does, neither like, nor believe adults. When Shiroko carried Sensei and arrived there, she was even disgusted; but eventually she trusted Sensei. She entrusted Shiroko to Sensei, hoping that Sensei could teach her well and don't let her make mistakes.
desc.ko: In another letter, Hoshino confesses that she does, neither like, nor believe adults. When Shiroko carried Sensei and arrived there, she was even disgusted; but eventually she trusted Sensei. She entrusted Shiroko to Sensei, hoping that Sensei could teach her well and don't let her make mistakes.
desc.zh_tw: 星野在另一封信中坦白，自己并不喜欢大人，也不相信大人。在白子第一次将老师背来时，她甚至有点嫌弃，但最终她信任了老师。她还将白子托付给了老师，希望老师能教导管好白子，不要让她犯错。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 星野在另一封信中坦白，自己并不喜欢大人，也不相信大人。在白子第一次将老师背来时，她甚至有点嫌弃，但最终她信任了老师。她还将白子托付给了老师，希望老师能教导管好白子，不要让她犯错。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 星野在另一封信中坦白，自己并不喜欢大人，也不相信大人。在白子第一次将老师背来时，她甚至有点嫌弃，但最终她信任了老师。她还将白子托付给了老师，希望老师能教导管好白子，不要让她犯错。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 星野在另一封信中坦白，自己并不喜欢大人，也不相信大人。在白子第一次将老师背来时，她甚至有点嫌弃，但最终她信任了老师。她还将白子托付给了老师，希望老师能教导管好白子，不要让她犯错。

desc.en: Hoshino gets on PMC's car, in which it would transport her to Abydos Desert.
desc.jp: Hoshino gets on PMC's car, in which it would transport her to Abydos Desert.
desc.thai: Hoshino gets on PMC's car, in which it would transport her to Abydos Desert.
desc.ko: Hoshino gets on PMC's car, in which it would transport her to Abydos Desert.
desc.zh_tw: 星野登上了PMC的车，那里的车将会把星野运到阿拜多斯沙漠。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 星野登上了PMC的车，那里的车将会把星野运到阿拜多斯沙漠。

name.ko: An Expectation of The Foreclosure Task Force

desc.en: Hoshino hoped that everyone could protect Abydos well. She added that, if ever, ever that they would meet her on the battlegrounds, she wanted them to destroy her halo.
desc.jp: Hoshino hoped that everyone could protect Abydos well. She added that, if ever, ever that they would meet her on the battlegrounds, she wanted them to destroy her halo.
desc.thai: Hoshino hoped that everyone could protect Abydos well. She added that, if ever, ever that they would meet her on the battlegrounds, she wanted them to destroy her halo.
desc.ko: Hoshino hoped that everyone could protect Abydos well. She added that, if ever, ever that they would meet her on the battlegrounds, she wanted them to destroy her halo.
desc.zh_tw: 星野希望大家能保护好阿拜多斯，并且，如果今后在战场上遇到她的话，能将她的光环破坏掉。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 星野希望大家能保护好阿拜多斯，并且，如果今后在战场上遇到她的话，能将她的光环破坏掉。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 星野希望大家能保护好阿拜多斯，并且，如果今后在战场上遇到她的话，能将她的光环破坏掉。

desc.en: Finishing reading, everyone is angry at Hoshino's irresponsibility. At this moment, they hears explosions coming outside.
desc.jp: Finishing reading, everyone is angry at Hoshino's irresponsibility. At this moment, they hears explosions coming outside.
desc.thai: Finishing reading, everyone is angry at Hoshino's irresponsibility. At this moment, they hears explosions coming outside.
desc.ko: Finishing reading, everyone is angry at Hoshino's irresponsibility. At this moment, they hears explosions coming outside.
desc.zh_tw: 读罢，众人对星野的“不负责任”非常生气。就在这时，他们听到外面传来爆炸声。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 读罢，众人对星野的“不负责任”非常生气。就在这时，他们听到外面传来爆炸声。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 读罢，众人对星野的“不负责任”非常生气。就在这时，他们听到外面传来爆炸声。

desc.en: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.jp: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.thai: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.ko: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.zh_tw: 是PMC公司及其各個子公司的CEO，蔚藍檔案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇與最終章中均有出現，主要目標是將基沃託斯納入自己的手下統治；曾與黑色西服人合作過。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 是PMC公司及其各个子公司的CEO，蔚蓝档案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇与最终章中均有出现，主要目标是将基沃托斯纳入自己的手下统治；曾与黑色西服人合作过。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 是PMC公司及其各个子公司的CEO，蔚蓝档案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇与最终章中均有出现，主要目标是将基沃托斯纳入自己的手下统治；曾与黑色西服人合作过。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 是PMC公司及其各个子公司的CEO，蔚蓝档案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇与最终章中均有出现，主要目标是将基沃托斯纳入自己的手下统治；曾与黑色西服人合作过。

hobby.jp: ショッピング

desc.en: PMC lead troops to disperse the citizens in Abydos, claiming that an order to leave immediately had been issued. As Hoshino, the former president of the former student union dropped out (i.e. being sold), the student union will not exist anymore, and as a result, the school will not, too.
desc.jp: PMC lead troops to disperse the citizens in Abydos, claiming that an order to leave immediately had been issued. As Hoshino, the former president of the former student union dropped out (i.e. being sold), the student union will not exist anymore, and as a result, the school will not, too.
desc.thai: PMC lead troops to disperse the citizens in Abydos, claiming that an order to leave immediately had been issued. As Hoshino, the former president of the former student union dropped out (i.e. being sold), the student union will not exist anymore, and as a result, the school will not, too.
desc.ko: PMC lead troops to disperse the citizens in Abydos, claiming that an order to leave immediately had been issued. As Hoshino, the former president of the former student union dropped out (i.e. being sold), the student union will not exist anymore, and as a result, the school will not, too.
desc.zh_tw: PMC带领部队前来驱散阿拜多斯地区的民众，宣称此处地方已经下达离开命令。由于作为前学生会成员的星野“退学”（被卖去凯撒），因而阿拜多斯学生会已名存实亡，阿拜多斯已不存在。
desc.zh_cn_jp: PMC带领部队前来驱散阿拜多斯地区的民众，宣称此处地方已经下达离开命令。由于作为前学生会成员的星野“退学”（被卖去凯撒），因而阿拜多斯学生会已名存实亡，阿拜多斯已不存在。

desc.zh_cn_cn: PMC带领部队前来驱散阿拜多斯地区的民众，宣称此处地方已经下达离开命令。由于作为前学生会成员的星野“退学”（被卖去凯撒），因而阿拜多斯学生会已名存实亡，阿拜多斯已不存在。
